statements: SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE tree_height > 5.0;
SELECT species_name, ecosystem_service FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT biodiversity_index, tree_height FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE biodiversity_index >= 3 ORDER BY tree_height DESC;
SELECT id, species_name, ecosystem_service FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' AND ecosystem_service = 'Pollination';
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data ORDER BY species_name ASC, tree_height DESC;
SELECT species_name, biodiversity_index FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE tree_height > 10;
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE biodiversity_index >= 3 AND ecosystem_service = 'Pollination';
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem_service FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data WHERE biodiversity_index < 2;
SELECT species_name, AVG(tree_height) AS avg_height FROM Agroforestry_Research_Data GROUP BY species_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_height DESC;
SELECT * FROM forests
SELECT forest_name, location FROM forests WHERE tree_species = 'Oak'
SELECT id, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT forest_name, tree_species FROM forests ORDER BY forest_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_forests FROM forests
SELECT * FROM forests WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT forest_name, tree_species FROM forests WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY forest_name ASC;
SELECT biodiversity_index, ecosystem_services FROM biodiversity WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT f.forest_name, b.date, b.biodiversity_index FROM forests f JOIN biodiversity b ON f.id = b.forest_id WHERE f.tree_species = 'Oak' AND b.biodiversity_index > 0.5 ORDER BY b.date ASC;
SELECT f.forest_name, b.ecosystem_services FROM forests f LEFT JOIN biodiversity b ON f.id = b.forest_id WHERE b.biodiversity_index IS NULL OR b.date IS NULL ORDER BY f.forest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Biodiversity WHERE abundance > 100;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM EcosystemServices;
SELECT research_id, species_id, service_id, research_date FROM ResearchData ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT research_id, research_description FROM ResearchData WHERE species_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM Biodiversity WHERE abundance > 100;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM EcosystemServices WHERE LENGTH(service_description) > 50;
SELECT species_name, research_description, research_date FROM Biodiversity JOIN ResearchData ON Biodiversity.species_id = ResearchData.species_id;
SELECT service_id, COUNT(research_id) AS total_research FROM ResearchData GROUP BY service_id ORDER BY total_research DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodata_research_study;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM biodata_research_study;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM biodiversity_data ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_services WHERE service_name LIKE '%pollination%';
SELECT service_name, AVG(service_value) FROM ecosystem_service_data GROUP BY service_name;
SELECT * FROM biodata_research_study;
SELECT study_id, study_name FROM biodata_research_study WHERE study_id = 2;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM biodiversity_data WHERE abundance > 50 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_services WHERE service_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data_id, service_id, AVG(service_value) AS average_value FROM ecosystem_service_data GROUP BY service_id HAVING AVG(service_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_research_data;
SELECT species_name, location, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_research_data WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM research_sites ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM research_sites WHERE land_use='Forest';
SELECT full_name, email, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution='University';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_research_data WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM biodiversity_research_data WHERE location = 'Forest' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_id, full_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT site_name, land_use, latitude, longitude FROM research_sites WHERE land_use IN ('Agricultural', 'Urban') ORDER BY site_name;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
